item.title: No title
item.description: When we set out to accomplish anything in life, big or small, we are choosing to focus our time and energy on something that ultimately satisfies a personal desire or professional goal with the end result being our happiness and wellbeing. Many times we find ourselves thrust into a whirlwind of life changes, sometimes of our choosing but most often in a way that feels completely out of our control. Â Sometimes you've got to ask the question of yourself " what is the outcome really worth"? We can get into the specifics regarding the value of a good relationship, great health, a good career and more, but ultimately it's got to make you happy and it's got to leave you feeling more alive than ever before.
